description: This CaseCrown Faux Suede Sleeve is the stylish way to protect your device. The exterior is soft, yet extremely durable material that is nice to the touch and uniquely eye striking. This case will help protect your device from scratches, dust, fingerprints, and damage without adding additional bulk. With its zipper closure and smooth interior, it provides an accessible and convenient solution for carrying your device on the go! It even has an additional external pocket for storing accessories. Look no further and make this case the choice carrying solution for your device. (Colors shown in pictures may slightly differ from actual product due to lighting and color settings.)
title: CaseCrown Faux Suede Sleeve (Black) for Samsung External Slim DVD Writer
